alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 26 at 3:10PM CDT until March 28 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT MDT /1 AM CDT/ TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MDT /1 AM CDT/ MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph causing possible blowing snow. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Colorado, northwest Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From midnight MDT /1 AM CDT/ tonight to midnight MDT /1 AM CDT/ Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
